function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Handling and processing of wastewater and effluent water samples","Impact":"Risk of contamination and spread of viral diseases","Mitigation":"Use of appropriate personal protective equipment (PPE) and adherence to safety protocols","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, autoclaves, and chemical disinfectants","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, and workers involved in sample processing","Owner":"Laboratory management and safety officers"},{"Description":"Viral RNA extraction and quantification procedures","Impact":"Risk of exposure to infectious viral material","Mitigation":"Conducting procedures in a controlled environment with proper ventilation and waste disposal","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, PCR workstations, and waste autoclaves","People":"Laboratory personnel, researchers, and workers involved in RNA extraction and quantification","Owner":"Laboratory management and safety officers"},{"Description":"Use of RT-PCR for viral RNA detection","Impact":"Risk of accidental exposure to viral particles during testing","Mitigation":"Training on proper handling of PCR equipment and use of appropriate PPE","Technologies":"PCR workstations, biosafety cabinets, and designated testing areas","People":"Laboratory personnel and technicians performing RT-PCR assays","Owner":"Laboratory management and safety officers"}]}
